The admin accidentally reused the same nonce to sign different transactions. Can you recover the private key from these signatures? The data: Sig1: c050c3f0b8d45b9e093a91cb96d097b24100e66585d0d8561e01c1231837493f111998a8ba2158b3044836f7783effd9faaf520daa738f2878ef46c13e21c2e5
Sig2: c050c3f0b8d45b9e093a91cb96d097b24100e66585d0d8561e01c1231837493ffb117c1c26d4144197b0e5270bb736e8bd5e034961e909eb0f0569d62df5020e

Public Key (x,y): (64938266744862941794301079344414926574374037668016522522469286656697911622998, 102522718064989868203507723245893001754419661380776152065650355793156320134604)
Messages:
1. CTF challenge message
2. Second signed message
Curve: secp256k1The flag format is flag{hex(private_key)}

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{6c8aa3a4ce346b5662043f3ed1c68c183a2976aeca5571c332ed2cdfa83a0d0e}
